001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.stream.IntStream;
007
008public class Table extends Object {
009    private Integer maxColumn;
010    private Integer maxRow;
011    private List<Grid> grids;
012    private Grid wall;
013    private Piece empty;
014    private List<Integer> direction;
015
016    public Table(Integer maxColumn, Integer maxRow) {
017        this.maxColumn = maxColumn;
018        this.maxRow = maxRow;
019        this.grids = new ArrayList<>();
020        this.wall = new Grid(new Piece(-1));
021        this.empty = new Piece(0);
022        this.direction = new ArrayList<>(
023                Arrays.asList(getDirectionUp(), getDirectionRight(), getDirectionDown(), getDirectionLeft(),
024                        getDirectionUpRight(), getDirectionUpLeft(), getDirectionDownRight(), getDirectionDownLeft()));
025        initialize();
026        return;
027    }
028
029    public void initialize() {
030        IntStream.range(0, maxColumn * maxRow).forEach(i -> grids.add(new Grid(i, empty, gridColumn(i), gridRow(i))));
031        grids.forEach(item -> item.initialize(nextGrids(item)));
032        return;
033    }
034
035    public Integer gridColumn(Integer index) {
036        return index % maxColumn;
037    }
038
039    public Integer gridRow(Integer index) {
040        return index / maxRow;
041    }
042
043    public List<Grid> nextGrids(Grid aGrid) {
044        List<Grid> aList = new ArrayList<>();
045        direction.forEach(item -> aList.add(nextGrid(aGrid, item)));
046        return aList;
047    }
048
049    public Grid nextGrid(Grid aGrid, Integer directionIndex) {
050        Integer index = aGrid.getIndex() + directionIndex;
051        if (isWall(aGrid, directionIndex))
052            return wall;
053        return grids.get(index);
054    }
055
056    public Boolean isWall(Grid aGrid, Integer nextGridIndex) {
057        Integer endGridColumn = maxColumn - 1;
058        Integer endGridRow = maxRow - 1;
059        Integer column = aGrid.getColumn();
060        Integer row = aGrid.getRow();
061        if (column == 0 && isDirectionLeft(nextGridIndex))
062            return true;
063        if (column == endGridColumn && isDirectionRight(nextGridIndex))
064            return true;
065        if (row == 0 && isDirectionUp(nextGridIndex))
066            return true;
067        if (row == endGridRow && isDirectionDown(nextGridIndex))
068            return true;
069        return false;
070    }
071
072    public Integer getDirectionUp() {
073        return -maxColumn;
074    }
075
076    public Integer getDirectionDown() {
077        return maxColumn;
078    }
079
080    public Integer getDirectionRight() {
081        return 1;
082    }
083
084    public Integer getDirectionLeft() {
085        return -1;
086    }
087
088    public Integer getDirectionUpRight() {
089        return getDirectionUp() + getDirectionRight();
090    }
091
092    public Integer getDirectionUpLeft() {
093        return getDirectionUp() + getDirectionLeft();
094    }
095
096    public Integer getDirectionDownRight() {
097        return getDirectionDown() + getDirectionRight();
098    }
099
100    public Integer getDirectionDownLeft() {
101        return getDirectionDown() + getDirectionLeft();
102    }
103
104    public Boolean isDirectionUp(Integer index) {
105        if (index == getDirectionUp())
106            return true;
107        if (index == getDirectionUpRight())
108            return true;
109        if (index == getDirectionUpLeft())
110            return true;
111        return false;
112    }
113
114    public Boolean isDirectionRight(Integer index) {
115        if (index == getDirectionRight())
116            return true;
117        if (index == getDirectionUpRight())
118            return true;
119        if (index == getDirectionDownRight())
120            return true;
121        return false;
122    }
123
124    public Boolean isDirectionDown(Integer index) {
125        if (index == getDirectionDown())
126            return true;
127        if (index == getDirectionDownRight())
128            return true;
129        if (index == getDirectionDownLeft())
130            return true;
131        return false;
132    }
133
134    public Boolean isDirectionLeft(Integer index) {
135        if (index == getDirectionLeft())
136            return true;
137        if (index == getDirectionUpLeft())
138            return true;
139        if (index == getDirectionDownLeft())
140            return true;
141        return false;
142    }
143
144    public List<Grid> getGrids() {
145        return grids;
146    }
147
148    public Integer getMaxColumn(){
149        return maxColumn;
150    }
151
152    public Integer getMaxRow(){
153        return maxRow;
154    }
155
156    public Grid getGrid(Integer aColumn,Integer aRow){
157        Integer index = gridsIndex(aColumn, aRow);
158        return grids.get(index);
159    }
160
161    public Integer gridsIndex(Integer aColumn,Integer aRow){
162        return (aRow * maxColumn) + aColumn;
163    }
164
165    public Piece getEmpty(){
166        return empty;
167    }
168
169    public Grid getWall(){
170        return wall;
171    }
172
173    public Boolean isPlacePiece(Player aPlayer,Grid aGrid){
174        Integer color = aPlayer.getPiece().getColor();
175        if(!aGrid.isPlacePiece()) return false;
176        Integer index = 0;
177        for (Grid aNextGrid : aGrid.getNextGrids()) {
178            Integer nextColor = aNextGrid.getPiece().getColor();
179            if (nextColor > 0 && nextColor != color && isPlacePieceColumn(color, aNextGrid.getNextGrid(index), index))
180                return true;
181            else
182                index++;
183        }
184        return false;
185    }
186
187    public Boolean isPlacePiece(Player aPlayer,Integer aColumn,Integer aRow){
188        Grid aGrid = this.getGrid(aColumn, aRow);
189        return isPlacePiece(aPlayer, aGrid);
190    }
191
192    public Boolean isPlacePieceColumn(Integer color, Grid aNextGrid, Integer index) {
193        Integer nextColor = aNextGrid.getPiece().getColor();
194        if (nextColor <= 0)
195            return false;
196        if (nextColor == color)
197            return true;
198        return isPlacePieceColumn(color, aNextGrid.getNextGrid(index), index);
199    }
200}
